table_description: Snapshots are saved instances of a Droplet or a block storage volume.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the snapshot.

columns.name: name
columns.description: A human-readable name for the snapshot.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Time when the block storage volume was created.

columns.name: min_disk_size
columns.description: The minimum size in GB required for a volume or Droplet to use this snapshot.

columns.name: regions
columns.description: An array of regions the snapshot is available in. The region slug is used.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the resource that the action is associated with.

columns.name: resource_type
columns.description: The type of resource that the action is associated with.

columns.name: size_gigabytes
columns.description: The billable size of the snapshot in gigabytes.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: An array of Tags the snapshot has been tagged with.
